text: :wave:  I'm Emily, an editor in the veterinary industry — have spent the past 5 years focused on the digital face of a peer-reviewed journal and developing content for a point-of-care product, but now moving into content marketing. Looking forward to learning from you all!

text:
Greetings! I'm Vladimir - growth marketer for <http://Markup.io|Markup.io>. Before admitting my deep love for B2B SaaS and MarkUp particularly, I was running a small digital marketing agency. Most of my experience lays in the area of performance marketing, but I'm looking forward to expanding knowledge about growth outside of paid ads & SEO.

Glad to join this community, I've heard a lot of good things about members there. Initially I learned about Superpath by reading <http://ahrefs.com|ahrefs.com> blog.

text: Hello All, my name is Deborah Sabinus from Nigeria and I am a content writer and social media manager. I look forward to connecting with you all. I am equally open to remote content roles.

elements.text: Hello All, my name is Deborah Sabinus from Nigeria and I am a content writer and social media manager. I look forward to connecting with you all. I am equally open to remote content roles.

text: Hi everyone, my name is Martin Angila. I'm a B2B SaaS content marketer and writer based in Kenya. A friend recommended me to this group and I'm already loving it. Looking forward to network with you guys and hopefully make meaningful connections. Cheers!

text: Hello! Not all of our members are guys. In an effort to be more conscious of the language we use to address each other, why not try “Hey, folks,” or “Hey everyone” instead?

I’m Aishwarya (Ash), building #Mensch as a holding company that builds and runs conscious, purpose-driven businesses on the internet.

We’ve a business position in <http://www.jhajistore.com|www.jhajistore.com>, a cultural food brand selling homemade pickles from Mithilanchal (a historically and culturally significant region in India with a unique subculture of its own).

In the last few years, I have built an agency business designing content marketing solutions to help young purpose-driven businesses earn their first few crores in revenues, get funded and acquired. We continue to collaborate with passionate founding teams who are building something that helps the sustainable development goals in one way or another.

I am curious and love to jam about a bunch of different topics: media, storytelling, marketing, d2c ecommerce, web3, creator economy, sustainability, morality and ethics, consciousness.

Excited to build with y’all.

You can connect with me on LinkedIn: <https://linkedin.com/in/aichaturvedi>

text: Hi, I’m Aditya Pathak. I completed my studies a long ago and since then I’m into digital marketing. I’m holding a profound knowledge of SEO, content marketing, lead generation, and so on. I help clients in generating leads and sales, resolving unique marketing challenges, building brand equity, reaching a larger audience, and tracking their success. I am always on the lookout for enthusiastic people in the digital marketing industry with whom I can collaborate
